messages.title: WE HAVE A CLEAR CHOICE
messages.content: The Conservative party has veered to the extreme. No wonder Tory stalwarts like Derbyshire’s Matthew Parris are fleeing the party.

messages.title: Higher Wages, Healthier Families, Urgent Climate Action
messages.content: That’s what our politicians should focus on. But the two tired old parties can’t deliver. It’s time for change and new leadership. It’s time government started working for you and your family again.

messages.title: A Fair Economy That Works For Us All
messages.content: Working hard and playing by the rules should lead to success. But for too many Derbyshire families, it doesn’t. The system is broken and our failing politics is making it worse. It’s just not right. But together, we can change it. A Lib Dem government will build a green economy in the East Midlands, linking Derby, Nottingham, and Leicester to create new industries, provide new opportunities and improve the playing field for all of us.

examples: The Conservative party has veered to the extreme. No wonder Tory stalwarts like Derbyshire’s Matthew Parris are fleeing the party.
That’s what our politicians should focus on. But the two tired old parties can’t deliver. It’s time for change and new leadership. It’s time government started working for you and your family again.
Working hard and playing by the rules should lead to success. But for too many Derbyshire families, it doesn’t. The system is broken and our failing politics is making it worse. It’s just not right.

A Lib Dem government will build a green economy in the East Midlands, linking Derby, Nottingham, and Leicester to create new industries, provide new opportunities and improve the playing field for all of us.

A Lib Dem government will build a green economy in the East Midlands, linking Derby, Nottingham, and Leicester to create new industries, provide new opportunities and improve the playing field for all of us.
Higher Wages, Healthier Families, Urgent Climate Action
That’s what our politicians should focus on. But the two tired old parties can’t deliver. It’s time for change and new leadership. It’s time government started working for you and your family again.
Working hard and playing by the rules should lead to success. But for too many Derbyshire families, it doesn’t. The system is broken and our failing politics is making it worse. It’s just not right.
The Conservative party has veered to the extreme. No wonder Tory stalwarts like Derbyshire’s Matthew Parris are fleeing the party.
Who knows where Jeremy Corbyn stands on Brexit? A Labour government would only lead to more Brexit chaos and confusion.
